rules_text: When Sacrifice to Setar dies, surveil X, where X is the amount of damage dealt to them this turn. Draw a card. Then if X is 3 or greater, you may return Sacrifice to Setar to the battlefield transformed.
special_text2:
Players play with the top card of their libraries revealed.
[+2]: Target player mills a card. Draw a card.
[+1]: Create a 1/1 blue Illusion creature token with “This gets +1/+1 for each other Illusion you control.”
